Works

Thank you for taking a look at my portfolio! As a hobbyist and working professional since 2006, I've developed a wide variety of skills that empower me to design products from ideation to inception to production. Whatever my title, I design for people, enriching their experiences with design that excites, unites, and ignites their curiosity. For more information about my skillset and experience, read about me or view my resume.
